## Source: ossf-package-analysis (598c8608b4b614d9033d369d92174dc32ec13fd7d6211694dff27427b6d06fa6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@dpdgroupuk/your-dpd-rest-api-client' @ 10.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
